action.action-desc: Mr. Allen introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to improve mental health services for students, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expanding Student Access to Mental Health Services Act.

subsection.text: Section 4104(b)(3)(B) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7114(b)(3)(B)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (iii), by striking and at the end; and
by adding at the end the following:

clause.text: improving the mental health services available to students, which may include—

subclause.text: identifying and disseminating best practices for mental health first aid;
assisting in the establishment or implementation of emergency planning, which may include emergency response teams to address emergencies at schools;
establishing or identifying agreements with local health agencies, including nonprofit, public, and private mental health agencies and institutions, to improve coordination of services; and

subsection.text: Section 4106(e)(1) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7116(e)(1)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (D), by striking and at the end;
by redesignating subparagraph (E) as subparagraph (F); and
by inserting after subparagraph (D), the following:

subparagraph.text: if applicable, how funds will be used for activities related to providing mental health services under section 4108; and

subsection.header: Activities To support the effective use of technology
subsection.text: Section 4109 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7119) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (5), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (6), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: providing technology to improve mental health services.

subparagraph.text: by striking A local and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: The limitation described in paragraph (1) shall not apply to technology infrastructure that is also used for mental health services.
